column6: This is FAKE DOVE BODY WASH
column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
column14: This is knock off Dove body wash and should be pulled from Amazon immediately. It is not nearly as thick, does not hold suds or really sud up and does not smell or moisturize like real Dove body wash. The bottle is in two languages and the push nozzle at the top is cheap knock off plastic. This is not real. Do not buy.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2020
column14: I bought this product with high hopes since I love Dove products but this body wash has left me and my boyfriends skin extremely itchy and dry almost moments after putting it on. Dissapointed.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020
column14: Not impressed with product liked the regular Dove body wash

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2022
column14: I have used Dove products, especially Dove bar soap for over 30 years, even use it to wash my face.  I also use the regular Dove body wash which has a nice scent and moisturizes my dry, sensitive skin better than any other body washes I have tried. When I got this product it was obviously not a product manufactured in the US, had I believe Arabic writing and I would have used the product but the scent was horrible. It did not smell like any lavender and lemon verbina I have ever smelled. Total waste of money. A best business practice for companies is transparency regarding products, etc. Amazon should be transparent with customers and state in description the product was not made in US, etc. Customers then have the option to purchase an item which may differ in quality from those made by Unilever in US. I cannot believe the prices on some items sold on Amazon and I can't see anyone paying almost $100 for a couple of bottles of cleaning solution, etc.  which sells for a tenth of the price in stores or online from retailers. Unbelievable. What is the rationale for such a huge markup?

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2021
column14: I bought this becausr I loved the scent when I bought it at another oulet. This has no scent. I'm very disappointed and will probably return it.  This one not only does have the ligering scent of the last bottle, it has no fragrance. No waste your money if you are looking for a fragrance.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2020
column14: I purchased the 34oz pump. I love it.  It's light and not too strong or heavy. It's sudsy so you don't have to use a ton of it and waste it. It left my skin feeling smooth after I exfoliates with their exfoliating scrub in the same scent.  I consider it a gate way though, haha. I started with this and then I moved on to some that carried more of a scent! But I will be using this one. I also use it on my 3 year old and it did not irritate her skin, a plus!
